column1: Table 8: Average minutes per day spent in selected food-related and other activities, on an average day in 2016, age 20 and older
— = suppressed due to small cell size.

Note:  A primary activity refers to an individual's main activity. The activity code for Grocery shopping is 070101; and the codes for Food preparation and cleanup are 020201, 020202, 020203, and 020299. Primary eating & drinking includes Eating and drinking (110101) and Eating and drinking as part of job (050202). Travel includes all 18xxxx activities; Paid work includes all 05xxxx activities except activity 050202; Sleeping includes activities 010101, 010102, and 010199; Watching TV includes activities 120303 and 120304; and Sports and exercise includes all 1301xx activities.
Source:  USDA, Economic Research Service, using data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics’ 2016 American Time Use Survey (ATUS) and Eating and Health Module.
